description: This file defines a React hook and context provider for managing notes within a note organizer application. It includes state management for notes, supports CRUD operations, implements local storage persistence, and provides filtering by search terms and tags.

methods.name: NotesProvider
methods.description: React component that provides notes state with local storage persistence and filtering capabilities.

methods.name: useNotes
methods.description: Custom hook to access the notes context within the React component tree.
